title: Riot Kayle already owned, no mystery gift received.
body: I thought that Riot said that each player who already owned Riot Kayle and Kayle would get a mystery skin, but so far, I've got nothing.  Is it delayed, or did they just not check? I can't be the only one right?

replies.body:
*Lew* is correct, we're still getting them out. We've been sending them out in waves to ensure they get out properly. 

Hit me up if you don't have anything by the 23rd.
got a frozen shen....  wish they at least gave a similar value of skin
All the 10 year gifts are going out one by one and you should get the mystery gift by 9/23.
